column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Over the years that I have tried other renditions of deep dish pizza up and down California
column2: such as Zachary's in Oakland. While they are all very good
column3: there was just something about the crust at Lou Malnati's. There are numerous theories
column6: or the ingredients. All I know
column7: I thoroughly enjoyed my deep dish pizza in Chicago.
